directions: ['Combine cornstarch, chicken broth, cheese, cornstarch and butter.', 'Bring to a boil and stir until thickened.', 'Add cheese and stir until melted.', 'Add cornstarch mixture and stir until mixture is smooth.', 'Pour into a greased 2-quart casserole.', 'Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.', 'Serve with crackers.']
